title: Cape Cod National Seashore: Freedom Of Information Act
body: Freedom Of Information Act       This link will take you to several websites which provide detailed information about the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA). Freedom of Information Act All FOIA requests to Cape Cod National Seashore must be made in writing, and must specify that they are FOIA requests. Send to: Superintendent, Cape Cod National Seashore, 99 Marconi Site, Wellfleet, MA 02667
